title: Client crashes entire computer during patching
body: Tried reinstalling league after a while, downloaded the installer, got into the client(able to download and update the new client no problem), logged in, patching to download the entire game. At some point, the internet for every other program stops working, then everything(except for the lol client) stops responding, including windows itself. When this happens, the update progress bar on the client stops downloading and hovering over it shows that the download is stopped with no change to the ETA. Left my PC with this running all day one day, league fully installs, however when i tried to open the client, before even the log in menu, it says there's a problem with the client and tells me to restart it(in an indefinite loop). Tried this both on my laptop and desktop with same results

replies.body:
It's hard to tell here, but it sounds like either your PC or connection is really struggling to get those updates, so the patcher failed to install properly.  Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) in this case to help perform a smooth reinstall.  

If the issue persists, start off with our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help rule out any possibilities with your connection struggling to grab those game files.
